title: One evacuated from northern Gaza, the other didn’t. They’re in the same hospital now
author: cnn
content: When Rami Mahmoud left his family’s home to buy food, his wife, Elham Maged, stayed behind to pray. When he made his way back through the narrow, tightly packed nearby streets of northern Gaza’s Jabalya Refugee Camp, he returned to a scene of complete chaos. An Israeli airstrike had smashed into the center of the densely populated community, tearing a deep crater into its heart. Their apartment had vanished.

title: 5 things to know for Nov. 20: Israel, Campaign trail, Weather, Freeway fire, Microsoft
author: cnn
content: CNN’s 5 Things brings you the news you need to know every morning.

title: China calls for ‘urgent’ action on Gaza as Muslim majority nations arrive in Beijing
author: cnn
content: The world must “must act urgently” to stem the conflict in Gaza, China’s top diplomat said Monday during a meeting with officials from Arab and Muslim majority nations, as Beijing steps up its efforts to play a role in establishing ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas conflict.

title: Premature, sick babies arrive in Egypt from Gaza after Al-Shifa evacuation
author: cnn
content: Ambulances carrying premature, sick babies crossed the Rafah border crossing into Egypt for life-saving treatment on Monday, according to live video broadcast on Egyptian state TV, after they were evacuated from Al-Shifa hospital in northern Gaza.

title: Israel-Hamas war rages as humanitarian crisis spirals in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Israel is releasing videos that it says prove Hamas uses Gaza’s largest hospital, Al-Shifa, for combat purposes. Several staff, patients and sheltering Palestinians have fled Al-Shifa since Israel raided the hospital. Follow live updates.

title: ‘Never going back:’ Israelis evacuated from border town with Lebanon fear war with Hezbollah
author: cnn
content: It should be the height of tourist season in Tiberias, an Israeli city on the western shore of the Sea of Galilee where the New Testament says many of Jesus’ miracles were performed.

title: CNN visited the exposed tunnel shaft near Al-Shifa Hospital. Here’s what we saw
author: cnn
content: With the Israeli Defense Forces, we traveled in a convoy of darkened Humvees to see the entrance of the newly exposed tunnel shaft in the compound of Al-Shifa Hospital.

title: Negotiators nearing a deal for initial release of dozens of hostages held by Hamas
author: cnn
content: A recent draft of a possible deal to secure the release of hostages that Hamas is holding in Gaza proposes a four- to five-day pause in fighting for the initial release of 50 hostages, two sources familiar with the talks tell CNN.

title: A world away from Gaza, Palestinian Americans in this New Jersey community hold their breath
author: cnn
content: Whether they have family in Gaza or the West Bank, Palestinian Americans here in northern New Jersey live with an unrelenting sense of dread

title: November 19, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: The US and Qatar gave upbeat assessments this weekend on negotiations to release Hamas hostages, while aid workers staged a perilous evacuation of newborns from Gaza’s largest hospital. Follow for live updates.

title: Video shows dozens of bodies after alleged attack at UN-run school in Gaza
author: cnn
content: A school run by the United Nations in northern Gaza has been hit with apparently devastating impact, the UN confirmed Saturday, in what a top UN official described as a “horrifying” incident.

title: Israel’s Benjamin Netanyahu battles on all fronts, amid growing pressure to free hostages
author: cnn
content: Waving Israeli flags, with posters of hostages draped on their backs, families of Gaza hostages and thousands of their supporters walked through the foothills of Jerusalem and towards the residence of Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, whose government many of them blame for the fate of their loved ones.

title: The Israel-Hamas war is driving a surge in US hate crimes. These Jewish Americans say it’s changing the way they live
author: cnn
content: Some Jewish Americans told CNN they are now hiding their kippahs, refusing to wear their Star of David necklaces and changing long-held traditions for religious holidays.

title: November 18, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel’s military says its troops will advance to anywhere Hamas is found, amid growing indications that an offensive into southern Gaza could be imminent.

title: Israel investigates sexual violence committed by Hamas as part of October 7 horror
author: cnn
content: Israeli police are using forensic evidence, video and witness testimony and interrogations of suspects to document cases of rape amid the October 7 Hamas attacks on Israel.

title: Opinion: ‘Beyond what a human being can endure.’ A lawyer on life in Gaza
author: cnn
content: In southern Gaza, lawyer Fatma Ashour writes on nightmarish conditions where water, food and fuel are almost nonexistent.

title: Five countries ask International Criminal Court to investigate the situation in Palestinian territories
author: cnn
content: The International Criminal Court’s prosecutor Karim Khan says his office has received a referral from five countries to investigate whether crimes have been committed in the Palestinian territories as part of Israel’s response to the October 7 Hamas terror attacks.

title: Opinion: The problem with a Gaza ceasefire right now
author: cnn
content: Accepting a ceasefire now in the Israel-Hamas war will cost many more lives in the long run, writes Aviva Klompas.

title: Hamas has demanded Israel stop flying drones over Gaza in hostage negotiations, sources say
author: cnn
content: Hamas has demanded that Israel stop flying surveillance drones over Gaza as part of its request that Israel pause its military operations in exchange for freeing hostages held by the terrorist group, according to two Israeli officials and third source familiar with the ongoing negotiations.

title: What we know about what Israel has found at Al-Shifa
author: cnn
content: Gaza’s largest hospital, Al-Shifa, has become a flashpoint in the conflict that began when Hamas militants crossed the border into Israel on October 7, killing around 1,200 people.

title: Israel is tightening its control of northern Gaza. But there is no clear post-war strategy in sight
author: cnn
content: The Israeli military is tightening its grip on northern Gaza, as its war on the Hamas militant group is showing no signs of abating.

title: Putin’s brutal war on Ukraine vanishes from news coverage amid raging conflict in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Vladimir Putin’s campaign of brutality against Ukraine is receiving much less attention from the press than it did prior to the Israel-Hamas conflict breaking out.

title: What pro-Palestinian and pro-Israeli supporters want you to know
author: cnn
content: As Israel and Hamas enter their second month of hostilities, large crowds have gathered at rallies around the world to express outrage about the ongoing conflict.

title: ‘Where will I leave these children, on the street?’ The struggle for survival faced by disabled Palestinians in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Since Israel’s complete siege on Gaza began, Hazem Saeed Al-Naizi, the director of an orphanage in Gaza City, had been gripped with fear, worried about when food, water and other basic necessities might run out for the dozens of children and young people in his care, most of whom are living with disabilities.

title: Opinion: Israel’s Palestinian strategy was a grave miscalculation
author: cnn
content: If Israel really wants to marginalize Hamas, it should rethink its attitude to Hamas’ archrivals: the Palestinian Authority in the West Bank, writes Hussein Ibish.

title: UN Human Rights chief calls for independent investigation into Al-Shifa hospital claims
author: cnn
content: The United Nations’ human rights chief has called on Israel to give his team access to Al-Shifa hospital in Gaza City, after Israel’s military released video of what it called an “operational tunnel shaft” in the complex’s grounds, a claim immediately rejected by Hamas and medical administrators as “ridiculous.”

title: Protests encapsulate progressive angst that could imperil Biden’s 2024 campaign
author: cnn
content: Israel could not have asked for a better friend than President Joe Biden.

title: November 17, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israeli troops will advance to anywhere Hamas is found, including the southern part of the Gaza Strip, a military spokesperson said, amid growing indications that an offensive into the southern part could be imminent.

title: Pro-Palestinian protests evacuated the DNC, stopped traffic on the Bay Bridge and are following Joe Biden around the country
author: cnn
content: A few people can make a very big scene. Pro-Palestinian protests evacuated the DNC, stopped traffic on the Bay Bridge and are following President Joe Biden around the country.

title: The former host of ‘Reading Rainbow’ used to encourage kids to read books. Now he’s telling adults not to ban them
author: cnn
content: As the National Book Awards came to a close on Wednesday, finalists for the prestigious literary prizes took the stage in New York to speak about the Israel-Hamas war. Others spoke out against book bans.

title: Top Israeli official has a warning for US universities
author: cnn
content: Nir Barkat, Israel’s minister of economy and industry, is warning American universities to crack down on antisemitism.

title: Body of Israeli hostage found near Al-Shifa hospital, IDF says
author: cnn
content: A 65-year-old Israeli woman who was kidnapped by Hamas militants on October 7 has been found dead near Gaza’s Al-Shifa hospital, the Israeli army said Thursday evening.

title: Have war crimes been committed in Israel and Gaza and what laws govern the conflict?
author: cnn
content: Since Hamas launched its brazen October 7 attack and Israel responded with intensive air strikes and a ground offensive, both sides have been accused of war crimes.

title: Israel drops leaflets on parts of southern Gaza suggesting possible expansion of offensive against Hamas
author: cnn
content: Israel has dropped leaflets across parts of southern Gaza calling on civilians to evacuate and “head towards known shelters,” indicating that Israel could soon expand its ground operation against Hamas southwards, after it claimed control of the north of the Strip earlier this week.

title: Man arrested and charged in death of Jewish protester in California after confrontation over Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: A 50-year-old man has been arrested in connection with the death of a Jewish protester who fell and hit his head during pro-Israeli and pro-Palestinian protests in Southern California earlier this month, the Ventura County Sheriff’s Office said Thursday.

title: 5 things to know for Nov. 16: Biden-Xi, Israel, Government shutdown, Immigration, SpaceX
author: cnn
content: CNN’s 5 Things brings you the news you need to know every morning.

title: November 16, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel released a photo and video of an alleged “operational tunnel shaft” it claimed was found in the Al-Shifa Hospital complex in Gaza. Hamas rejected the claim as “baseless lies.”

title: Top House Democrats evacuated from DNC headquarters as police clash with protesters calling for Gaza ceasefire
author: cnn
content: Law enforcement clashed with protesters calling for a ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas war outside of the Washington headquarters of the Democratic National Committee Wednesday night after authorities said the demonstration turned violent and lawmakers were evacuated from the building.

title: UN Security Council adopts resolution calling for urgent ‘humanitarian pauses and corridors’ in Gaza
author: cnn
content: The UN Security Council has approved a resolution calling for “humanitarian pauses and corridors” in war-torn Gaza, a breakthrough after weeks of bitter negotiations.

title: Exclusive: Bodycam video shows early moments of Hamas massacre in Israel and tunnels under Gaza
author: cnn
content: On the eastern edge of Gaza, dawn is still a few minutes away on the morning of October 7. A group of Hamas militants wait, some packed into a white pickup truck, others on motorbikes. They run through a few final checks, making sure they are recording video and that their weapons are ready.

title: Father of injured American teen in Gaza calls on Biden to do more to protect US citizens
author: cnn
content: A trip to see family in Gaza has turned into a nightmare for 17-year-old Farah Abuolba.

title: Why Gaza’s largest hospital has become the ‘epicenter’ of Israel’s war on Hamas
author: cnn
content: Gaza’s largest hospital has become a microcosm of the wider war and the rhetoric around it. Here’s what to know.

title: November 15, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israeli forces raided Gaza’s biggest hospital in what the military said was a “precise and targeted operation.” Soldiers found “military equipment used by Hamas,” the military said in a statement but offered no evidence yet of a vast tunnel network it claimed was used by Hamas.

title: Israeli troops and tanks raid Gaza’s Al-Shifa Hospital
author: cnn
content: Israel said it had launched a military operation against Hamas early Wednesday morning inside Gaza’s largest hospital Al-Shifa, where thousands of Palestinians are believed to be sheltering.

title: Belize suspends diplomatic ties with Israel, renews call for ‘immediate ceasefire’
author: cnn
content: The government of Belize will suspend diplomatic ties with Israel over its refusal to implement a ceasefire in Gaza, adding to the list of countries in the Western Hemisphere voicing anger over the Israeli government’s war conduct.

title: How antisemitic hate groups are using artificial intelligence in the wake of Hamas attacks
author: cnn
content: Hate groups and far-right internet trolls have seized on the tensions surrounding the Israel-Hamas war, while leveraging advances in artificial intelligence to further stoke antisemitism in the United States.

title: Exclusive: Found document suggests Iran sought to help Hamas make its own weapons ahead of attack, sources say
author: cnn
content: A document recovered from a computer found inside a Hamas pickup truck outside Gaza, obtained by CNN from Israeli officials, shows a Hamas military commander requesting a scholarship for Hamas operatives to study engineering, physics and technology at universities in Iran.

title: White House says intelligence shows Hamas using al-Shifa hospital for command node, storing weapons
author: cnn
content: The White House said Tuesday that Hamas is storing weapons and operating a command center from the al-Shifa hospital in Gaza, revealing publicly what US intelligence has shown is underneath the medical facility.

title: Biden says a deal to free hostages held by Hamas is ‘going to happen’ as officials say they are nearing an agreement
author: cnn
content: Biden says a deal to free hostages held by Hamas is ‘going to happen’ as officials say they are nearing an agreement

title: Families of hostages kidnapped by Hamas give heart-wrenching details at the packed ‘March for Israel’ in DC
author: cnn
content: Alana Zeitchik stood alone before a massive crowd that filled the National Mall. But she represented countless families in the US and around the world ripped apart by Hamas’ mass kidnappings and slaughter in Israel.

title: Biden preparing to discuss Israel and Ukraine wars with Xi – and make case to Beijing for containment
author: cnn
content: When President Joe Biden meets Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday for a rare, high-stakes summit, two major wars – the Ukraine-Russia conflict, now deep into its second year, and the Israel-Hamas war that has entered its second deadly month – will serve as the backdrop amid extraordinary global tumult.

title: Former Biden and Obama officials give president a boost over his Israel support amid party divide
author: cnn
content: A high-profile group of former Biden and Obama administration and campaign officials sent a message of support to President Joe Biden for his backing of Israel in the wake of the October 7 attacks by Hamas as he faces division within his own party on the matter.

title: Israel shows alleged Hamas ‘armory’ under children’s hospital in Gaza. Local health officials dismiss the claims
author: cnn
content: The Israeli military’s focus on hospitals in Gaza is growing more intense with a spokesperson inviting news media to visit a medical center for children on Monday, where he alleged parts of the basement had been a Hamas “command and control center” and may have been used to hold hostages.

title: Israelis are arming up in the aftermath of Hamas’ attack. Some are worried it is playing to the far right’s vision for the country
author: cnn
content: Behind tables laden with more than 50 assault rifles, Israel’s far-right national security minister, Itamar Ben Gvir, smiled at a crowd of people who had come to the coastal city of Caesarea for a ceremony to receive the firearms.

title: UN mourns the deaths of more than 100 aid workers in Gaza, the highest number killed in any conflict in its history
author: cnn
content: More United Nations staff members have been killed in Gaza than in any other single conflict in the organization’s 78-year history, the UN said Monday, a stark reminder that humanitarian workers from global agencies have not been spared from Israel’s relentless bombardment of the besieged strip.

title: November 14, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel says its forces are carrying out a “precise and targeted operation” at the Al-Shifa Hospital. Israel has claimed the hospital, the largest in the Gaza Strip, includes a Hamas command center, an allegation denied by hospital officials and Hamas.

title: Blinken acknowledges disagreements within State Department on Israel-Hamas war in email to staff
author: cnn
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken acknowledged disagreements within the State Department over the Biden administration’s approach to Israel-Hamas war in an email to staff Monday.

title: Biden told me that a pause in the fighting will save lives in Gaza. Here’s why he’s wrong
author: cnn
content: Rabbi Jessica Rosenberg writes about attending a Biden fundraiser and challenging him to insist that Israel cease its shelling of Gaza, writing that a “pause” in the shelling “cannot truly be called “humanitarian.”

title: November 13, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Conditions at the Al-Shifa hospital, the largest in Gaza, are “catastrophic” as essential units have collapsed, the facility’s director told CNN.

title: West Bank Palestinians face increasing restrictions and settler violence as Gaza war escalates
author: cnn
content: To be at work by 9 a.m., Joseph Handal gets up at 4:30 a.m., even though his workplace, a Franciscan church in the Old City of Jerusalem, is only a few miles from his home in Bethlehem.

title: Hamas has command node under Al-Shifa hospital, US official says
author: cnn
content: A US official with knowledge of American intelligence says Hamas has a command node under the Al-Shifa hospital, uses fuel intended for it and its fighters regularly cluster in and around Gaza’s largest hospital.

title: White House reveals 3-year-old American among Hamas hostages
author: cnn
content: A 3-year-old American citizen toddler is one of the hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza, the White House said Sunday.

title: Doctors race to save newborns as Israel says it’s battling Hamas around Gaza’s largest hospital
author: cnn
content: Premature babies at Gaza’s largest hospital are being wrapped in foil and placed next to hot water in a desperate bid to keep them alive in “catastrophic” conditions, the hospital director has warned, as Israeli firepower pounds surrounding streets and remaining fuel reserves dry up, leaving the facility unable to function.

title: Israel’s soccer team loses to Kosovo as videos show some fans booing national anthem
author: cnn
content: The Israeli national soccer team on Sunday played its first match since the Israel-Hamas war started, losing 1-0 against Kosovo in a European Championship qualifying match.

title: In pictures: Israel at war with Hamas
author: cnn
content: One month ago, the Palestinian militant group Hamas launched a brutal assault on Israel, killing around 1,200 people and kidnapping more than 240, according to Israeli authorities. It was the deadliest terror attack in the country’s history.

title: More than 180,000 demonstrators march in France against antisemitism
author: cnn
content: Tens of thousands of people took to the streets across France on Sunday to call out a sharp rise in antisemitic acts since the start of the Israel-Hamas war.

title: November 12, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Gaza’s largest hospital is in a “catastrophic situation” amid heavy fighting nearby, health officials say.

title: GOP presidential candidate Chris Christie vows to relay ‘atrocities’ he saw in Israel upon return to US
author: cnn
content: GOP presidential hopeful Chris Christie promised on Sunday to tell Americans of the devastation he saw in Israel after becoming the first Republican presidential candidate to visit the country following the October 7 Hamas attacks.

title: Netanyahu refuses to answer CNN on whether he would take responsibility for October 7 attack
author: cnn
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday refused to answer whether he would take responsibility for failing to prevent the October 7 attack on Israel, saying that there would be time for such “difficult” questions once the war is over.

title: Gaza hospital in ‘catastrophic situation,’ amid heavy fighting nearby, health officials say
author: cnn
content: Heavy fighting near Gaza’s largest hospital has left it in a “catastrophic situation,” with patients and staff trapped inside, ambulances unable to collect the wounded and life-support systems without electricity, health officials and aid agencies are reporting.

title: November 11, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: The Hamas-run health ministry says Israel laid siege to Gaza’s largest hospital Saturday. The IDF denies the claim, but acknowledged heavy fighting in the area.

title: ‘Please stop this.’ Gaza’s hospitals are failing under the weight of war. US medical groups are scrambling to help
author: cnn
content: Doctor Mohammed Ghneim has not left his hospital in Gaza City in four weeks. He can’t remember the last time he slept or ate, and his blue scrubs are stained in the blood of patients who’ve died in his arms.

title: Saudi-hosted summit condemns Israel as Iran leader pays rare visit
author: cnn
content: Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi has arrived in Saudi Arabia for a summit on the Israel-Hamas war, telling reporters that “Palestine is the most important issue in the Islamic world.”

title: Pro-Palestinian protesters snarl Manhattan traffic and limit Grand Central access as they call for ceasefire Friday
author: cnn
content: Hundreds of pro-Palestinan protesters snarled Manhattan traffic and curtailed people’s access to Grand Central Terminal as they demonstrated in New York City on Friday night, in part demanding a ceasefire in the Israel-Hamas war.

title: Gaza hospital ‘surrounded by tanks’ as other healthcare facilities say they’ve been damaged by Israeli strikes
author: cnn
content: Israeli tanks have surrounded a Gaza hospital, its director told CNN, as strikes reportedly hit the vicinity of other healthcare facilities in the Strip, heightening fears Friday that Israel’s military campaign is further endangering patients and medical staff in the besieged territory.

title: November 10, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken gave one of his most direct condemnations yet of the mounting death toll in Gaza, saying “far too many Palestinians have been killed.”

title: Blinken brings a notable shift in US language toward Israel as pressure mounts at home and abroad
author: cnn
content: When US Secretary of State Antony Blinken lamented the civilian death toll in Gaza on Friday, it marked a subtle but notable shift in US language toward the Israeli government.

title: Hostage negotiators discussing days-long fighting pause between Israel and Hamas in exchange for freeing large group
author: cnn
content: The parties involved in the ongoing negotiations to secure the release of hostages that Hamas is holding in Gaza are working toward a deal that would entail a sustained, days-long pause in fighting in exchange for a large group of hostages being freed, a senior US official familiar with the talks told CNN Friday.

title: I was one of the lucky few to escape Gaza. Here’s how I fled for my life
author: cnn
content: The early hours of my escape were a relief. I had been a drowning man, searching for something to grab on to survive. In leaving Gaza, I was given a lifeline.

title: 5 things to know for Nov. 10: Israel, Senate, Suspicious letters, Mortgage rates, School vaccines
author: cnn
content: CNN’s 5 Things brings you the news you need to know every morning.

title: Blinken denounces civilian toll in Gaza, says ‘far too many Palestinians have been killed’
author: cnn
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday declared that “far too many Palestinians have been killed, far too many have suffered these past weeks” – one of his most direct condemnations of the civilian toll in Gaza.

title: Biden administration privately warned by American diplomats of growing fury against US in Arab world
author: cnn
content: The Biden administration has received stark warnings from American diplomats in the Arab world that its strong support for Israel’s destructive and deadly military campaign in Gaza “is losing us Arab publics for a generation,” according to a diplomatic cable obtained by CNN.

title: ‘A death sentence’: British doctor flees Gaza but is sent back to war zone
author: cnn
content: A British doctor who escaped Gaza with his family has been sent back to the war zone after Egyptian officials told him his name wasn’t on the list of evacuees, according to a British Member of Parliament.

title: November 9, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel had agreed to daily four-hour pauses of military operations in areas of northern Gaza, the White House said Thursday. A senior Israeli official said the “tactical localized pauses” would give people in the north the ability to travel south for aid and relief.

title: ‘We’re feeling this moment in our bones’: Death of Jewish protester has shaken his Southern California synagogue
author: cnn
content: Shock and grief have reverberated through the congregation of Temple Etz Chaim since one of its longtime members, Paul Kessler, fell and fatally struck his head during dueling Israel-Hamas war protests in Thousand Oaks, California, over the weekend, synagogue leaders said during a Wednesday night vigil.

title: Iran envoy says Tehran had no direct role in Hamas’ Israel rampage, or proxy attacks on US forces
author: cnn
content: Iran has reiterated that despite its financial backing and support for Hamas and other proxy groups in the region, it does not direct any of their actions, the Islamic Republic’s United Nations ambassador told CNN in an interview.

title: Christie to visit Israel this weekend
author: cnn
content: Former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie will visit Israel on Sunday, which will make him the first Republican presidential candidate to visit the country since the October 7 Hamas attacks.

title: 14 killed in West Bank city of Jenin after Israeli incursion, Palestinian health ministry says
author: cnn
content: At least 14 Palestinians were killed in the refugee camp Jenin, in the occupied West Bank, following an Israeli military raid, according to the Palestinian Ministry of Health.

title: October 7, 2023: Israel says it is ‘at war’ after Hamas surprise attack
author: cnn
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu declared that Israel is “at war” following a surprise attack from Gaza by Hamas militants.

title: Israel is stepping up its campaign on Gaza City. Here’s what we know about the fighting
author: cnn
content: Israeli has intensified its ground and air campaign on Gaza in recent days, with officials claiming to have reached “the heart” of the besieged enclave’s main city.

title: This Palestinian girl went from wearing a sparkly tiara to bandages. Even in her hospital bed, she may not be safe
author: cnn
content: Three-year-old Joudi hasn’t uttered a word in 16 days, her father says. Wearing a gray dress adorned with a picture of an ice cream cone, she stares ahead, a vacant look in her eyes, while sitting in bed at al-Shifa Hospital in Gaza City.

title: Israel will begin 4-hour pauses in military operations in Gaza each day, White House says
author: cnn
content: Israel will begin to implement four-hour pauses in areas of Northern Gaza each day, the White House said Thursday.

title: Gaza workers expelled from Israel accuse Israeli authorities of abuse, including beatings
author: cnn
content: Palestinian workers who were expelled back to Gaza from Israel last week have accused Israeli authorities of “torture,” alleging they were stripped naked, held in cages, viciously beaten and, according to one worker’s account, subjected to electric shocks.

title: She fled the Israeli army as a young woman. Now in her 90s, she is running again
author: cnn
content: Souad Al-Alem was one of the roughly 10,000 people forced to flee the Palestinian town of al-Majdal. It was 1948, she was a young woman and Israel’s troops were approaching the community during the Arab-Israeli war in what is now part of the Israeli city of Ashkelon.

title: More than 10,000 killed in Gaza, Hamas-controlled health ministry says, as condemnation of Israel’s campaign grows
author: cnn
content: More than 10,000 people have been killed in Gaza since Israel launched its military offensive nearly a month ago, the Hamas-controlled health ministry in the Palestinian enclave said Monday.

title: News outlets deny prior knowledge of Hamas attack after Israeli government demands answers over misleading report
author: cnn
content: Four news organizations strongly denied on Thursday having had prior knowledge of Hamas’ Oct. 7 terror attack, after the Israeli government demanded answers from the press and stoked questions about their credibility over a thinly sourced report from an agenda-driven media monitoring group that insinuated news organizations knew about the looming assault.

title: Visualizing the Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: As fighting intensifies across Gaza and Israel, CNN is visualizing the war through maps, charts and more.

title: How to help humanitarian efforts in Israel and Gaza
author: cnn
content: As deadly fighting between Israel and Hamas intensifies, so too does a dire humanitarian crisis in the area.

title: UN report warns war has already set Gaza and West Bank economy back more than a decade
author: cnn
content: A report released Thursday by UNDP paints a dire picture of the economic conditions in the Palestinian enclave

title: Disturbing videos emerge showing atrocities against African ethnic groups in Darfur
author: cnn
content: Members of African ethnic groups in Sudan’s Darfur region appear to have been rounded up by members of the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces and other Arab militias, according to videos and images verified and geolocated by CNN that appeared online since the weekend.

title: Opinion: Do Palestinian lives matter to the world?
author: cnn
content: “The unfolding catastrophe in Gaza raises critical questions about the relevance of international humanitarian laws. Do they still matter? Do Palestinian lives matter to the world?” writes Hani Almadhoun.

title: ‘Nothing is left’: Thousands of Palestinians flee south as Israel steps up Gaza City offensive
author: cnn
content: Palestinians fleeing south in Gaza through an Israel Defense Forces (IDF) evacuation corridor on Wednesday described an unbearable reality in Gaza City, with constant airstrikes and no water.

title: UN rights chief says both Israel and Hamas have committed war crimes
author: cnn
content: Both Hamas and Israel have committed war crimes in the past month, the United Nations human rights chief said, as thousands of Palestinians fled south amid Israel’s intensifying offensive against the Islamist militant group.

title: November 8, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Thousands of Palestinians are fleeing northern Gaza as Israel continues its offensive in the war against Hamas. Follow for live news updates.

title: California officials ask for the public’s help as they investigate the death of a Jewish man during Israel-Hamas war protests
author: cnn
content: Southern California investigators are asking for the public’s help as they parse through conflicting witness accounts about what led up to the death of a 69-year-old Jewish man who fell and suffered a fatal head injury during dueling Israel-Hamas war protests on Monday, authorities say.

title: Emotions are running high at the White House as some aides’ frustration with Israel is growing
author: cnn
content: Angst, unease and outrage are spreading through corners of the Biden administration as Israeli forces show no signs of letting up their relentless attacks inside Gaza and the civilian death toll in the besieged enclave – already in the thousands – continues to climb.

title: US Reaper drone shot down near Yemen by Iran-backed Houthi rebels, official says
author: cnn
content: An unmanned US military drone was shot down off the coast of Yemen by Houthi forces, a defense official tells CNN.

title: Tensions boil over as Democrats’ Israel divide deepens
author: cnn
content: Rep. Debbie Wasserman Schultz set off an uproar in the House Democratic Caucus when she bluntly described her view of members who didn’t back a resolution affirming support for Israel in its war against Hamas.

title: Opinion: Why Biden supports Israel so wholeheartedly
author: cnn
content: Frida Ghitis looks at the reasons why Biden supports Israel so wholeheartedly – even when it’s taking a political toll at an auspicious time.

title: UNICEF defends accuracy of Gaza death toll as horror unfolds in ravaged enclave
author: cnn
content: A UNICEF spokesperson has defended the death toll being reported out of Gaza, saying the organization’s figures match those of the Hamas-controlled Gazan health ministry, as scores of Palestinians evacuated to the territory’s south on Tuesday.

title: Gazans wave white flags and hold up ID papers as they flee south
author: cnn
content: Waving white flags and holding identification papers aloft, residents of northern Gaza were seen fleeing south during a four-hour window allotted by the Israel Defense Forces for civilians to escape Tuesday.

title: November 7, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: More than 10,000 people have been killed in Gaza since Israel launched its military offensive following Hamas’ October 7 attack, the Palestinian Ministry of Health in Ramallah said. Follow for live updates.

title: White House warns Israel over post-war plans for Gaza
author: cnn
content: White House warns Israel against reoccupying Gaza as Netanyahu signals what a post-war strip could look like

title: Democrats concerned over Tlaib’s anti-Israel rhetoric, but are not backing new GOP censure efforts
author: cnn
content: House Democrats are growing increasingly alarmed by Rep. Rashida Tlaib’s comments that are critical of Israel, but so far, have stopped short of saying the Michigan Democrat deserves to be censured over her rhetoric.

title: These charts show the scale of loss in the Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: It is a month since Hamas launched its unexpected and brutal attack on Israel. More than 1,400 Israelis were killed in the assault, and more than 240 were taken hostage, according to a count by Israeli officials. The Hamas-run Ministry of Health in the Gaza Strip says more than 10,000 Palestinians have died in the military campaign launched in response by Israel.

title: He thought his daughter was killed by Hamas. Now he says she may be held hostage
author: cnn
content: Mourning his 8-year-old daughter believed killed in Hamas’ October 7 attacks on Israel, Thomas Hand said he was at least partially consoled militants had not taken her hostage.

title: One month on, what we know about the Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel and Hamas are at war, after the Palestinian militant group launched surprise cross-border raids from Gaza on October 7, killing more than 1,400 people and taking hostages.

title: Opinion: Biden needs to call for a ceasefire and restore respect for international law
author: cnn
content: President Joe Biden has the opportunity to change the reality on the ground — for Israelis and for Palestinians, writes Mary Ellen O’Connell. She says Biden can begin by winning an immediate ceasefire.

title: Opinion: I’m an expert in urban warfare. Israel is upholding the laws of war
author: cnn
content: During Israel’s attack on Gaza, the destruction and suffering, as awful as they are, don’t automatically constitute war crimes – otherwise, nearly any military action in a populated area would violate the laws of armed conflict by John Spencer

title: The world is turning against Israel’s war in Gaza – and many Israelis don’t understand why
author: cnn
content: Yoav Peled says he has started wondering if the world has gone mad.

title: Gaza becoming a ‘graveyard for children,’ UN chief warns as calls for ceasefire intensify
author: cnn
content: Gaza is “becoming a graveyard for children,” the United Nations chief warned on Monday as the death toll rises and calls grow around the world for a ceasefire, one month into Israel’s assault on Hamas, the militant group that runs the enclave.

title: November 6, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: More than 10,000 people have been killed in Gaza since Israel launched its military offensive nearly a month ago, the Hamas-controlled health ministry in the enclave said Monday. Follow for live updates.

title: US plans to transfer $320 million in precision bomb equipment to Israel in sale approved earlier this year
author: cnn
content: The US is planning to transfer $320 million worth of precision guided bomb equipment to Israel, according to three people familiar with the matter, amid Israel’s ongoing aerial bombardment of Gaza as part of its war on Hamas.

title: Blinken says progress made on Middle East trip despite few tangible results
author: cnn
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Monday asserted he made progress on the goals he set for a whirlwind Middle East trip as he departed with few tangible results to show for a flurry of meetings with leaders about the Israel-Hamas war.

title: Opinion: What’s Iran’s real plan in its proxy battle against Israel?
author: cnn
content: Iran supports Hamas, Hezbollah and other opponents of Israel but hasn’t shown visible signs that it wants to see the Israel-Hamas war expand into a regional confrontation that could draw in the United States, writes Peter Bergen.

title: American Arabs, Muslims and Jews: How has the Israel-Hamas war changed you?
author: cnn
content: As a member of the Jewish, Arab or Muslim communities in America, have you felt the need to adjust your daily life amid heightened fears of hate-motivated incidents? If you’re willing to share your story, we want to hear from you.

title: South Africa and Chad recall diplomats from Israel
author: cnn
content: South Africa and Chad have announced they will recall diplomats from Israel for “consultation” in response to the Israel-Hamas conflict.

title: Israel’s cyber defense chief tells CNN he’s concerned Iran could increase severity of its cyberattacks
author: cnn
content: After suspected Iranian hackers claimed a string of hacks on Israeli security cameras in the last two weeks, Israel’s cyber defense chief tells CNN he is “very concerned” that Iran could escalate its long-running covert battle with Israel in cyberspace with more serious and disruptive cyberattacks on Israeli infrastructure as the war between Israel and Hamas shows no sign of ending.

title: 5 things to know for Nov. 6: Israel, Trump trial, Election workers, Extreme weather, Pollution
author: cnn
content: CNN’s 5 Things brings you the news you need to know every morning.

title: November 5, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Dozens of people were killed and many more wounded in a blast at the Al-Maghazi refugee camp in the central Gaza Strip late Saturday night, according to an official at a nearby hospital. Follow live updates.

title: Jordan’s Queen Rania says being pro-Palestinian does not equal being ‘antisemitic’
author: cnn
content: Queen Rania Al Abdullah of Jordan has called for a ceasefire in Israel’s war against Hamas, saying that supporting the protection of Palestinian lives does not equal being antisemitic or pro-terrorism.

title: ‘The whole building fell on us’: Blast at refugee camp in central Gaza kills dozens
author: cnn
content: Dozens were killed and many more injured in a blast at the Al-Maghazi refugee camp in the central Gaza Strip late Saturday night, according to an official at a nearby hospital and eyewitnesses who spoke with CNN.

title: Biden aides grapple with 2024 outreach as Israel-Hamas war exposes cracks in coalition
author: cnn
content: Top aides to President Joe Biden have embarked on outreach campaigns they hope will help make his handling of the Israel-Hamas crisis a defining element of his presidency — and his campaign for a second term, particularly if contrasted with likely 2024 rival Donald Trump.

title: Sanders says he doesn’t know that a ceasefire is possible ‘with an organization like Hamas’
author: cnn
content: Independent Sen. Bernie Sanders said Sunday he doesn’t know that a ceasefire is possible in the Israel-Hamas war with “an organization like Hamas” involved.

title: Blinken meets Palestinian Authority President Abbas in West Bank amid growing settler violence
author: cnn
content: Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Palestinian Authority President Mahmoud Abbas in Ramallah Sunday amid escalating settler violence in the West Bank following the Hamas attack on Israel on October 7.

title: Opinion: Israel-Hamas war’s endgame
author: cnn
content: When wars end, politics shapes the future. Last week, as Israel carried on its military response to the October 7 Hamas terror attack, its political goals — and potential endgame — remained a source of huge controversy

title: In Gaza, being a mother is a matter of life and death
author: cnn
content: Rajaa Musleh, 50, has been sheltering at Al-Shifa hospital, Gaza’s largest medical facility, which has been inundated not just by patients, but also displaced people desperately hoping that it might provide some protection from Israel’s brutal aerial campaign.

title: ‘The reaction is extreme’: Palestinians fear arrest if they voice sympathy for Gaza civilians
author: cnn
content: Dua Abu Sneineh was shocked when a group of police officers – between 10 and 15, she said – barged into her home in East Jerusalem early on October 23. “I was not even considering for a moment that they would be coming for me,” she told CNN. But the police did come for her.

title: November 4, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: As Israel intensifies its air and ground assault, up to a million people have fled northern Gaza to the south, according to a US special envoy, deepening the humanitarian crisis.

title: Pro-Palestine protests in DC and across the US call for a ceasefire
author: cnn
content: As Israel continues its fourth week of intense bombardment of the besieged Gaza strip, huge crowds of protesters have gathered to call for a ceasefire in Washington, D.C. as well as in other capital cities around the globe.

title: Divides remain between US and Arab partners after Blinken meets counterparts in Jordan
author: cnn
content: Sharp divides persisted between the United States and its Arab partners on their response to Israel’s war against Hamas after Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Middle Eastern counterparts in Amman Saturday.

title: Palestinian American family mourns 42 relatives killed in a single day in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Thousands of miles away from the brutality of war in Gaza, Tareq Hamoud and his wife Manal are in disbelief over the loss of three generations of their family.

title: Obama says people need to acknowledge complexity of Israel-Palestinian conflict to move forward
author: cnn
content: Former President Barack Obama weighed in on the violence in Gaza, saying any constructive action would require acknowledging the complexity of the situation.

title: Democratic Rep. Tlaib accuses Biden of supporting Palestinian ‘genocide’ and warns of political ramifications
author: cnn
content: Democratic Rep. Rashida Tlaib of Michigan on Friday accused President Joe Biden of supporting a Palestinian “genocide” and warned that Americans will remember when he’s up for reelection next year how he responded to the Israel-Hamas war.

title: Protest, fear and pride: US college students reflect on how they’re impacted by Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Whether they have family and friends in danger or want to argue for one cause or another, college students reveal how the Israel-Hamas was is affecting them.

title: Opinion: Progressives should never tolerate antisemitism
author: cnn
content: Antisemitism is fundamentally antithetical to the progressive movement, writes Julian Zelizer. Now is the time for those on the left to be crystal clear that social hatred, discrimination and violence toward Jews will not be tolerated within their own ranks.

title: ‘No international protection at all.’ Grief and anger erupt on air after another Palestinian journalist is killed in Gaza
author: cnn
content: A Palestine TV correspondent and 11 members of his family were killed Thursday in southern Gaza following an alleged Israeli airstrike on his home, according to a statement from Palestinian Authority run television network.

title: Israel admits airstrike on ambulance near hospital that witnesses say killed and wounded dozens
author: cnn
content: There are dozens of casualties after an incident near Gaza’s Al-Shifa Hospital, according to multiple videos from the scene and the Hamas-run Palestinian Ministry of Health in Gaza.

title: Witness to a massacre: Israeli festival survivor returns to site of Hamas rampage
author: cnn
content: Aliza Samuel walks carefully through debris left strewn across the ground, picking up a bracelet before coming across some small clay trinkets that had been handmade during the Nova Music Festival.

title: November 3, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken meets with Israeli leaders, as Israel’s military says it is surrounding Gaza City amid an intensifying bombardment of the strip.

title: ‘An existential threat’: Antisemitic attacks soar across Europe amid Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: “This takes us back to the darkest times,” Chief Rabbi Jaron Engelmayer told CNN, as he surveyed piles of destroyed holy books in a blackened and burnt out ceremonial hall.

title: Pentagon pulls Defense Department support for congressional travel to Israel, restricts official visits
author: cnn
content: The Pentagon has pulled Defense Department support for Congressional visits to Israel and restricted official visits nearly one month into the war in Gaza, according to a memo obtained by CNN.

title: US anticipates shift in Israel’s tactics in the coming week, senior US official says
author: cnn
content: US officials are anticipating a new phase of the Israel-Hamas war in the coming days in which Israel decreases the scale of its air campaign and focuses on a more tactical ground operation.

title: US warns Israel amid Gaza carnage it doesn’t have long before support erodes
author: cnn
content: President Joe Biden and his top advisers are warning Israel with growing force that it will become increasingly difficult for it to pursue its military goals in Gaza as global outcry intensifies about the scale of humanitarian suffering there.

title: Israeli ground forces closing in on Gaza City, satellite imagery and videos show
author: cnn
content: Israeli ground forces are advancing on Gaza City, the largest and most densely packed population center in the Palestinian enclave, satellite imagery and videos from open and official sources suggest.

title: Opinion: Israeli health care providers say they feel betrayed by friends and colleagues
author: cnn
content: Interviews with Israeli health professionals and providers reveal a common feeling of betrayal from other scholars, colleagues and counterparts, writes Dr. Leana Wen.

title: Blinken in Israel: ‘We need to do more to protect Palestinian civilians’
author: cnn
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday issued a strong message after a day of meetings with Israeli leaders in Tel Aviv, declaring, “we need to do more to protect Palestinian civilians.”

title: US surveillance drones flying over Gaza to help with hostage search
author: cnn
content: The US military is flying surveillance drones over Gaza as part of American efforts to help Israel locate the more than 240 hostages still held by the terror group Hamas, according to multiple US officials familiar with the matter.

title: Opinion: The piercing sadness of a child’s birthday party in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Nadia AbuShaban writes on the piercing sadness of celebrating her nephew’s 12th birthday in Gaza, with one eye on the window watching for airstrikes, and not knowing if it will be his last.

title: Israel expels Gazan workers back to war-torn enclave
author: cnn
content: Dozens of Palestinian workers in Israel returned to besieged Gaza on Friday following an Israeli government decision to expel Gazan laborers from the country.

title: ‘It all feels like a nightmare.’ This mom and former Israeli tank commander is leading her tech startup from a war zone
author: cnn
content: Maayan Cohen was on a flight from Tel Aviv to Las Vegas when she learned through a text that a terror attack was unfolding in Israel.

title: November 2, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Israel’s military says it is surrounding Gaza City as its bombardment of the strip continues. Follow for live news updates.

title: Airstrikes blast UN shelters, official says, as Israel announces complete encirclement of Gaza city
author: cnn
content: The Israeli military has completely encircled Gaza City, according to a spokesperson, as the United Nations’ main relief agency in the isolated enclave accused Israeli warplanes of lethally bombing UN-run schools sheltering civilians.

title: Surgery without drugs, patients piling up: Gaza’s hospitals overwhelmed amid Israeli strikes and fuel shortages
author: cnn
content: In Al-Shifa hospital, Gaza’s largest medical facility, a dazed and drowsy woman sits on the floor with a bleeding leg. A younger man lies flat on blood-stained tiles, his neck and legs wrapped in bandages.

title: House passes $14.3 billion in Israel aid, setting up showdown with Senate
author: cnn
content: The House is expected to vote on Thursday on a bill that would allocate $14.3 billion in aid to Israel – a move that sets up a clash with the Democrat-led Senate over proposed funding cuts as well as aid to Ukraine in an early leadership test for Speaker Mike Johnson.

title: US intel suggests Syria’s Assad agreed to send Russian missile system to Hezbollah with Wagner group help
author: cnn
content: The US has intelligence that Syrian President Bashar al-Assad has agreed to provide the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah with a Russian-made missile defense system, according to two people familiar with the intelligence.

title: Why the GOP plan to cut IRS funds to pay for Israel aid would increase the deficit
author: cnn
content: The Republican-controlled House is once again targeting the Internal Revenue Service, this time voting to cut some of the agency’s funding to pay for a $14.3 billion emergency aid package for Israel.

title: As Gaza conflict rages, online maps from Chinese companies are missing Israel’s name
author: cnn
content: Beijing has clarified that Israel remains marked on official maps issued by Chinese authorities after questions emerged over why the country’s name was not visible on online maps provided by two major Chinese companies.

title: CNN Investigates: Forensic analysis of images and videos suggests rocket caused Gaza hospital blast, not Israeli airstrike
author: cnn
content: In the days since a blast ripped through the packed Al-Ahli Baptist Hospital in Gaza City, killing hundreds of Palestinians, dueling claims between Palestinian militants and the Israeli government over culpability are still raging. But forensic analysis of publicly available imagery and footage has begun to offer some clues as to what caused the explosion.

title: Opinion: Countries breaking ties with Israel are sending it an important warning
author: cnn
content: Rather than acting in isolation and possibly falling into the trap set by Hamas and Iran, Israel ought to pursue a strategic and security-oriented campaign, writes DJ Rosenthal.

title: Revisiting a key video used to assess the Gaza hospital blast
author: cnn
content: A video cited by Israel and the US as part of their assessments of the deadly Al-Ahli Baptist Hospital blast in Gaza on October 17 does not appear to be directly related to the explosion, according to a CNN analysis of several videos that builds on previous reporting.

title: Inside the painstaking negotiations to agree on a deal allowing foreigners to leave Gaza
author: cnn
content: The breakthrough that allowed an initial group of foreign nationals, including US citizens, to depart Gaza on Wednesday came together after weeks of intensive, multi-party diplomatic efforts, sources familiar with the negotiations told CNN.

title: Israel aid drama is the latest failure of American governance
author: cnn
content: The House’s struggle to send $14 billion in emergency aid to Israel is exposing political rifts that leave America looking like a divided super power unable even to rush help to a friend that believes it’s fighting an existential war.

title: US intelligence currently assesses Iran and its proxies are seeking to avoid a wider war with Israel
author: cnn
content: The US intelligence community believes – for now – that Iran and its proxies are calibrating their response to Israel’s military intervention in Gaza to avoid direct conflict with Israel or the US while still exacting costs on its adversaries.

title: News outlets take a more critical stance towards Israel Defense Forces as civilian deaths mount in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Spokespersons for Israel’s military are being confronted by anchors on live television, pressed to answer for the deaths of innocent families caught in the heavy crossfire.

title: How the tiny Arab state of Qatar became indispensable in talks with Hamas
author: cnn
content: The tiny Persian Gulf state of Qatar is once again front and center in global diplomacy, this time for its efforts to mediate deals to free hostages taken by Hamas during its October 7 attacks in Israel, as well as evacuate foreign nationals from Gaza.

title: What is the Rafah crossing, Gazans’ last hope to escape the war, and how does it work?
author: cnn
content: The border in the south of the besieged enclave has been seen as the last hope for Gazans to escape as Israel’s bombs rain down on the strip.

title: Gaza population being ‘dehumanized’ UN agency warns as Netanyahu rejects ceasefire calls
author: cnn
content: The entire population of Gaza is “being dehumanized,” the UN Commissioner-General of the main UN agency operating in the besieged strip told the UN security council Monday, as Isareli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu ruled out calls for a ceasefire, saying “this is a time for war.”

title: November 1, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Crowds gathered at the Rafah crossing between Gaza and Egypt on Wednesday, as multiple sources told CNN that up to 500 foreign nationals could be allowed to flee the besieged enclave. Follow for live updates.

title: Minnesota AG Keith Ellison says it would be helpful if Biden was more forceful on protecting civilians in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison, a key Muslim American ally of President Joe Biden, said Wednesday it would be helpful for the president to speak out more forcefully about the imperative of protecting civilians in Gaza.

title: Biden facing tough questions over Israel’s strikes on civilians
author: cnn
content: President Joe Biden and his top national security officials are increasingly confronting questions about Israel’s commitment to minimizing civilian deaths and how scenes from Gaza could affect his domestic political standing.

title: Israel’s ground operation in Gaza is underway. Here’s what we know about the military’s movements
author: cnn
content: Drawing on videos and photos from open and official sources, as well as reporting from CNN teams on the ground, it appears as though Israeli forces crossed the border in three main locations.

title: Democrats’ big tent includes most Jewish and Muslim Americans
author: cnn
content: Israel’s response to the October 7 Hamas terror attacks exposes a long-festering divide inside the preferred political party of the majority of Jewish and Muslim Americans.

title: Foreign nationals and injured Palestinians allowed to flee Gaza for first time since Israel-Hamas war began
author: cnn
content: Injured Palestinians and hundreds of foreign nationals have started crossing from Gaza into Egypt, officials and Egyptian media said, in the first sanctioned exodus from the besieged enclave in weeks.

title: Catastrophic damage after second Israeli airstrike hits Gaza refugee camp
author: cnn
content: An Israeli strike on the densely populated Jabalya refugee camp in northern Gaza caused many casualties, officials in the enclave said Tuesday.

title: Drone attack on coalition base in Syria results in minor injury to service member from US partner force
author: cnn
content: A service member from a US partner nation suffered a minor injury after a one-way attack drone struck al-Tanf garrison in Syria, a US defense official said Wednesday.

title: Antisemitic vandalism rattles Jewish communities amid growing tension in the US
author: cnn
content: An antisemitic phrase scrawled on a Holocaust survivor’s home in California. A display supporting Israeli hostages kicked over in Minnesota. Palestinian nationalist messaging spray-painted on a non-profit’s building in Rhode Island. All, according to local reports, are among the latest acts of vandalism to shake Jewish communities in the US amid increasingly tense rhetoric and protests surrounding the war between Israel and Palestinian militant group Hamas and as the head of the FBI warns antisemitism in the country is reaching “historic levels.”

title: Senate GOP split on whether to endorse House’s plan to pass Israel aid separately
author: cnn
content: In the latest indication that Republican senators are deeply divided over tying aid for Ukraine to Israel funding, Sen. Lindsey Graham said it would be “huge mistake” to separate the two after listening to Secretary of State Anthony Blinken and Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin testify before the Senate Appropriations Committee on Tuesday.

title: Gen. David Petraeus and historian Andrew Roberts: The huge challenge facing Israel
author: cnn
content: Two leading experts on warfare say the Gaza war may be more challenging than any of the conflicts they have examined since 1945.

title: Opinion: There’s a smarter way to eliminate Hamas
author: cnn
content: Israel’s strategy for defeating Hamas — destroying its military and political capabilities to the point where the terrorist group can never again launch major attacks against Israeli civilians — is unlikely to work, writes Robert A. Pape.

title: Israel says it thwarted aerial attacks by Yemen’s Houthis near Red Sea
author: cnn
content: The Israeli military said Tuesday it had thwarted an aerial attack by Iran-backed Houthi rebels in Yemen, as fears rise across the region that the Israel-Hamas war could widen.

title: October 31, 2023 - Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Israeli forces said a strike on a refugee camp in northern Gaza killed a top Hamas commander responsible for the October 7 attack on Israel. Hamas denied the claim.

title: October 30, 2023 - Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made clear on Monday that Israel would not agree to a ceasefire, saying “this is a time for war.”

title: Israeli forces rescue soldier held by Hamas in special operation, IDF says
author: cnn
content: A female Israeli soldier who was abducted by Hamas has been rescued in a special joint operation, the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) told CNN, the first successful hostage extrication since the militant group’s October 7 rampage.

title: Israeli troops advance in Gaza, hostage freed and ‘impossible’ hospital evacuation: What to know Monday
author: cnn
content: Israeli troops have advanced more than two miles into Gaza in their expanding ground operation, a CNN analysis has found, as aid groups warned civil order is breaking down and hospitals grapple with “impossible” orders to evacuate patients.

title: Shani Louk, 23-year-old kidnapped by Hamas from music festival, declared dead, Israel says
author: cnn
content: A 23-year-old German-Israeli woman who was kidnapped from the Nova music festival by Hamas militants on October 7 has been found dead, the Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs has said.

title: An anti-Jewish riot in Russia’s Dagestan region shows the risks of Putin’s balancing act on Hamas
author: cnn
content: Images of antisemitic rioters overrunning an airport in Dagestan’s Makhachkala Uytash Airport have shaken Russia’s Jewish community, stoked international outrage and raised serious questions about the blowback from Vladimir Putin’s war on Ukraine – now in the Russian leader’s view directly linked to events in Gaza.

title: October 15, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Conditions in Gaza have deteriorated into a “complete catastrophe,” aid workers say, as tens of thousands of Palestinians try to flee south. Follow here for live updates..

title: Thai deaths in Hamas massacre spotlight poor agricultural workers from Asia who toil in Israel’s fields
author: cnn
content: Like his father Chumporn and dozens of other able-bodied men from their village in northeast Thailand, Manee Jirachart moved to Israel in search of work, dreaming of a better life.

title: Traumatized Thai farmers recount horror of Hamas massacre as families wait for news of loved ones held hostage
author: cnn
content: Touching the side of his neck gingerly, 30-year-old Withawat Kunwong reveals a jagged network of scars he received after being attacked at a poultry farm where he had been working in southern Israel.

title: Efforts to get hostages out of Gaza complicated by Israel’s expanding ground operation
author: cnn
content: US officials are intently focused on trying to secure the release of hostages being held by Hamas in Gaza – among them American citizens – a task that sources say is now further complicated by Israel’s expansion of its ground operations into Gaza.

title: House GOP’s $14.3 billion Israel aid sets up collision course with Senate
author: cnn
content: The House has released text of the supplement Israel funding bill, appropriating $14.3 billion dollars to the Mideast nation. As Speaker Mike Johnson noted last week, the bill includes the same amount in spending cuts, rescinding $14.3 billion that had been allocated to the IRS as part of the Inflation Reduction Act.

title: Opinion: ‘Dark, terrifying, claustrophobic.’ What it’s like inside Hamas’ tunnels
author: cnn
content: Daphné Richemond Barak, author of “Underground Warfare,” tells CNN national security analyst Peter Bergen that tunnels built by Hamas in Gaza are likely to be a key target of the Israeli offensive sparked by the October 7 terror attack.

title: Fuel is a vital lifeline in resource-strapped Gaza. Here’s why.
author: cnn
content: Fuel shortages have crippled hospitals, water systems, bakeries and relief operations in Gaza as more than 2 million people there are suffering from dire shortages of basic supplies and medical care.

title: Antisemitic mob storms through Russian airport as flight from Tel Aviv lands
author: cnn
content: An angry crowd in Russia’s mostly Muslim region of Dagestan stormed an airport where a flight from Israel arrived on Sunday, forcing authorities to close the facility and divert flights.

title: Biden pressed Netanyahu to get more humanitarian aid into Gaza as fears grow over conflict escalating
author: cnn
content: President Joe Biden on Sunday pressed his Israeli counterpart to “immediately” scale up the flow of humanitarian aid into Gaza, and a top Israeli official told CNN as many as 100 trucks a day could soon be moving into the enclave.

title: Israel’s history suggests the clock is ticking for Netanyahu after Hamas attack failures
author: cnn
content: In his more than three decades in politics, Benjamin Netanyahu has accrued almost as many nicknames as he has election wins.

title: US communicating with Israel at ‘the highest levels’ about protecting Gaza civilians but quiet on expanding war
author: cnn
content: The United States is communicating “at the highest levels” to the Israeli government the importance of protecting civilian lives in Gaza, the top US national security adviser said Sunday, even as he repeatedly declined to say whether Israel was going about its war in the right way.

title: Oil prices are falling even as Israel steps up its war on Hamas. A spike could still happen
author: cnn
content: Global oil prices fell Monday even after Israel’s military expanded its ground operations in Gaza over the weekend, raising fears that the country’s war with Hamas could spill over into a regional conflict.

title: Will Palestinian refugees come to the US?
author: cnn
content: Could the Israel-Hamas war lead to a rise in the number of Palestinian refugees coming to the US? Here’s a look at some key questions to consider, and the answers we know so far.

title: October 29, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Israel says the next stage of its war with Hamas has begun after expanding its ground operations in Gaza. Meanwhile, the humanitarian crisis in the enclave is deepening. Follow for live updates.

title: UN warns ‘civil order’ declining in Gaza as thousands take basics from warehouses
author: cnn
content: ﻿The main United Nations agency in Gaza warned Sunday there are signs “civil order is starting to break down” after “thousands” of people broke into its warehouses and distribution centers in central and southern parts of the enclave, “taking wheat, flour and other basic survival items.”

title: Harris says US has no intention of sending combat troops to Israel or Gaza
author: cnn
content: Vice President Kamala Harris said in an interview that the US has “absolutely no intention” of sending American combat troops into Israel or Gaza amid fears over a wider regional conflict.

title: Netanyahu under pressure from hostages’ families and cabinet as Gaza operation escalates
author: cnn
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu received sharp criticism after he accused security chiefs in a now-deleted social media post of failing to warn him about the impending Hamas attack prior to October 7.

title: Why Israel showed searing images of the Hamas attack
author: cnn
content: On Friday, CNN was part of a small group of journalists in the United States shown a graphic video of the brutal October 7 attack carried out by Hamas.

title: Democratic divisions over Israel spill into public view as conflict escalates
author: cnn
content: The debate over Israel’s conduct in its war against Hamas is exposing deep tensions in the House Democratic Caucus as Rep. Andre Carson called fellow Democrat Josh Gottheimer a “punk” and a “coward” and that the two “could get into something else” after they disagreed over a measure aimed at showing support for Israel.

title: Pro-Palestinian protesters calling for ceasefire gather across the globe as bombardment of Gaza intensifies
author: cnn
content: After Gazans experienced on Friday night what they described as the most intense bombardment by Israeli forces since the October 7 Hamas attack, pro-Palestinian demonstrators across the globe took to the streets on Saturday to call for a ceasefire.

title: Israeli ground forces inside Gaza as Palestinians take stock after intense overnight bombardment
author: cnn
content: Israeli ground forces are inside Gaza ﻿after entering the enclave overnight, as Palestinians experienced what they have described as the most intense round of airstrikes since Israel began its retaliation against Hamas’ October 7 terror attack.

title: October 28, 2023 Israel-Hamas war
author: cnn
content: Israel says the next stage of its war with Hamas has begun after expanding its ground operations in Gaza. “The war inside Gaza is going to be long,” the Israeli prime minister warned.

title: The ‘Gaza metro’: The mysterious subterranean tunnel network used by Hamas
author: cnn
content: The myriad tunnels under Gaza are best known as passageways used to smuggle goods from Egypt and launch attacks into Israel.

title: ‘You get home and then start crying’: Israel’s body collectors encounter horrors beyond their worst nightmares
author: cnn
content: Weeks after Hamas’ deadly terror attack, volunteers with ZAKA, a religious search and rescue organization, are still painstakingly working to recover victims’ remains in southern Israel.

title: October 27, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: A large series of explosions has rocked Gaza City Friday night, according to CNN teams near the Israel and Gaza border. Follow for live updates on the Israel-Hamas war.

title: IDF announces expanded ground operation in Gaza, amid communications blackout in the enclave
author: cnn
content: The Israel Defense Forces (IDF) is “expanding ground operations” in the Gaza Strip, IDF spokesman Rear Admiral Daniel Hagari announced Friday, as intense airstrikes rocked the besieged enclave and with communications links reportedly severed.

title: US strikes 2 facilities linked to Iranian-backed militias in Syria following series of attacks on US forces in Middle East
author: cnn
content: The US carried out airstrikes targeting two facilities linked to Iranian-backed militias in eastern Syria on Thursday, according to a statement from Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin, following a series of drone and rocket attacks against US forces in the region.

title: A nonprofit is racing to get its portable baby incubators into Israel and Gaza as crisis deepens
author: cnn
content: Jane Chen is racing against the clock, again. She knows well how every minute that passes is crucial for a new life that emerges prematurely into the world in the most vulnerable of circumstances — in the midst of war, in the aftermath of a natural disaster or in a remote village far away from a medical center.

title: Gaza’s disappearing internet, visualized
author: cnn
content: Connectivity in the Gaza Strip has fallen from about 95% in early October to around 37% as of Friday, according to data from NetBlocks.

title: Nations overwhelmingly vote for humanitarian truce at the UN, as Gazans say they have been ‘left in the dark’
author: cnn
content: An overwhelming majority of nations – 120 countries – voted on Friday for a United Nations resolution calling for a “sustained ﻿humanitarian truce” in Gaza, even as Israel’s military announced it is “expanding ground operations” in the besieged enclave.

title: Hundreds of foreign nationals remain stranded in Gaza as Israel intensifies airstrikes
author: cnn
content: More than two weeks of intense negotiations to evacuate foreign nationals out of Gaza have yielded few signs of progress, leaving hundreds of desperate civilians stranded inside the war-torn strip of land ahead of what appears to be an imminent Israeli incursion.

title: Leading GOP Jewish group’s conference presents chance for 2024 Republicans to distinguish themselves from Trump on Israel
author: cnn
content: GOP 2024 presidential candidates traveling to the Republican Jewish Coalition’s annual conference are facing a unique challenge this year: how to distinguish themselves from former President Donald Trump on their support and approach to defending Israel as the war between the country and Hamas rages on.

title: Harris and second gentleman meet with families of Americans who remain unaccounted for in Israel
author: cnn
content: Vice President Kamala Harris and Second Gentleman Doug Emhoff met on Friday morning with family members of Americans who remain unaccounted for in Israel, some of whom are believed to be held hostage by Hamas.

title: Muslim American leaders, in private meeting, tell Biden he needs to show more empathy toward Palestinians
author: cnn
content: Muslim American leaders told President Joe Biden in a small private meeting Thursday he and his administration needed to show more empathy toward Palestinian lives and pushed back on his comment this week casting doubt on civilian death figures in Gaza provided by the Hamas-run health ministry there, according to two of the attendees.

title: Opinion: UN Secretary General’s grievous failure of diplomacy
author: cnn
content: If the politics in the Israel and Palestine conflict are explosive, diplomacy too is a minefield, as the UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres’ statement this week proved, writes Frida Ghitis.

title: Hedge fund billionaire: College students protesting Israel have ‘sh*t for brains’
author: cnn
content: Hedge fund billionaire Leon Cooperman is blasting college students for protesting against Israel, joining a growing list of powerful university donors to speak out on the issue.

title: Palestinian officials publish names of thousands killed in Gaza, after Biden expresses doubt about death toll
author: cnn
content: The health ministry in Hamas-controlled Gaza has published a report listing the names of thousands of what it described as “documented deaths since October 7th” in Gaza, which it blamed on Israeli military “aggression,” after US Preside

title: ‘Significant progress’ on Qatar-led negotiations to release hostages from Hamas but issues remain
author: cnn
content: There has been “significant progress” on negotiations to release hostages held by Hamas but there are issues still remaining, diplomatic sources familiar with the negotiations told CNN.

title: Iran may not want a full-blown war with Israel, but it may be dragged into one
author: cnn
content: A day after Palestinian militant group Hamas launched its brutal attack on Israel, a curious video emerged out of Tehran’s Azadi stadium. Hundreds of soccer fans, gathered to watch a match between Perspolis FC and Gol Gohar Sirjan FC, chanted in unison: “Shove the Palestinian flag up your a**.”

title: A student asked a NYC teacher which side she’s on in the Israel-Hamas war. Here’s what she said
author: cnn
content: Across the US, teachers are grappling with how to discuss the complexities of the Israel-Hamas war in their classrooms. Some teachers are trying to explain the complex roots of the conflict, while others are avoiding touchy history lessons and focusing instead on students’ mental health.

title: Journalist’s family was killed in Gaza strike, says Al Jazeera
author: cnn
content: Al Jazeera says its bureau chief in Gaza, Wael Al-Dahdouh, lost his wife, son, and daughter in what it said was Israeli airstrike. The blast hit a house in the Nuseirat refugee camp in the central Gaza Strip where the family was taking shelter after being displaced, according to Al Jazeera.

title: October 26, 2023 Israel-Hamas war news
author: cnn
content: Israel’s military said it carried out a “targeted raid” overnight in northern Gaza using tanks. The move came hours after Benjamin Netanyahu said Israel was preparing for a ground operation following the deadly October 7 Hamas attacks. Follow here for live news updates.

title: Israel vows more raids in Gaza as calls for ceasefire divide the United Nations
author: cnn
content: Israel conducted a “targeted raid” using tanks in northern Gaza before withdrawing, its military said Thursday, as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu warned a ground incursion into the besieged enclave will take place.

title: Opinion: How likely is a US-Iran escalation in the Middle East?
author: cnn
content: The Middle East, currently resembling Europe on the eve of World War I, could tip into many possible outcomes, such as a US-Iran escalation or Iran joining the fight against Israel more directly, writes Charles Dunne.

title: Messaging app Telegram restricts access to some Hamas-run channels
author: cnn
content: The messaging app Telegram has restricted access to several channels closely associated with or operated by Hamas, as the militant group’s war with Israel rages on.

title: Opinion: WGA’s statement on Israel is worse than too little, too late
author: cnn
content: The Writer Guild of America’s (WGA) delayed statement on Hamas terror in Israel, published on Tuesday, says practically nothing, writes Roy Schwartz. Compared to other Hollywood guild or union statements, and even WGA’s earlier condemnations of other controversial events, the guild’s stance is cowardly, Schwartz argues.

title: Opinion: I’m an American stranded in Gaza. Why isn’t the US doing more to bring us home?
author: cnn
content: It started out as a family vacation. It has turned into a nightmare for Abood Okal, who traveled to Gaza in late September with his wife and infant son, and now is trapped with his family in a war zone.

title: The New York Times walks back flawed Gaza hospital coverage, but other media outlets remain silent
author: cnn
content: Most news organizations seem eager to sweep last week’s negligent coverage of the Gaza hospital explosion under the rug, moving on from the low moment covering the Israel-Hamas war without admitting any mistakes.

title: An Al Jazeera journalist learned his family had been killed while on the air. It offered the world a glimpse of the horrors in Gaza
author: cnn
content: Grief in Gaza: Al Jazeera is grieving. The Qatari-funded news network said Wednesday that an Israeli air strike had killed the family of its Gaza bureau chief, Wael Al-Dahdouh — a devastating reality that Dahdouh learned on-air while reporting on the Israel-Hamas war.

title: Florida cargo flights arranged by DeSantis carried drones and body armor for Israel
author: cnn
content: Two cargo planes recently orchestrated by Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis to carry supplies into Israel also contained drones, body armor and helmets for the war-ready country, CNN has learned.

title: Here’s why Israel’s ground offensive in Gaza hasn’t happened yet
author: cnn
